name: Leetcode Explained
description: Created a free, open source browser extension with over 1k daily active users
Adds company tags, solution videos, and GPT code analysis directly into Leetcode problems
Available for Chrome, Firefox, and Edge

name: FaceMorpher
description: Created the frontend for an iOS app with over 13k downloads in the iOS App store
Blends two faces together and returns the morphed face

name: The Office Script API
description: Designed and developed a REST API which receives over 100 requests per week
Allows users to talk to characters from NBC's The Office
The character will respond with lines from the show
Implemented full-text search and levenshtein distance functionality

name: compareprenatals.com
description: Created a website that allows pregnant women to find the best prenatal vitamin for them
Contains over 100 prenatal vitamins with extensive nutritional data
Allows users to sort vitamins by nutritional content, price, and more

name: Speech to Text for ChatGPT
description: Adds a speech to text microphone into the ChatGPT website
A free, open source browser extension available for Chromium browsers

name: appnaca.org
description: Created main website for local nonprofit organization
Donate to charities & schedule appointments for free health clinics

name: Countdown Timer
description: Smart countdown timer that helps you stay focused and productive
Served as tech lead handling code reviews, merging pull requests, and conducting scrum meetings
ElectronJS, ReactJS, ExpressJS,  MySQL, Trello, Nginx, Github Actions, and DigitalOcean

name: RecipeGPT
description: Reads recipes from any website and summarizes them using ChatGPT
No need to scroll through long blog posts to find the recipe
A free, open source browser extension available for Chromium browsers
